/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and shops, their facades adorned with vibrant red lanterns that add a touch of cultural charm to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. Cars and buses traverse the street, hinting at the city's dynamic pace of life. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
